EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-09-19 Reserved Instances AWS Webinar.ES-2018-09-17 Reserved Instances A
EmailTemplate.subject: Will I see you tomorrow?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/reserved-instances-aws/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Join Eric Wright, Director of Technical Marketing, and Maggie Schroeder, Product Marketing, tomorrow at 11 am ET for a live demonstration on Turbonomic's Reserved Instance Optimization in AWS.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/reserved-instances-aws/]]>
In this 30-minute presentation <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/reserved-instances-aws/]]>, you will learn how to:
- Plan for purchasing RIs in minutes without spreadsheets - Deliver the best purchase to meet performance demand and budget goals - Optimize your current RI portfolio to increase performance and lower cost
See you there! Megan
PS - If you can't join the live webinar, feel free to sign up anyways <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/reserved-instances-aws/]]>, and I'll send you the recording afterward.
